verses.roman:
śuniyā prabhura mana prasanna ha-ila
duṅhāra antara-kathā duṅhe se jānila

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing this; prabhura—of Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mana—mind; prasanna—satisfaction; ha-ila—felt; duṅhāra—of both of Them; antara-kathā—confidential talks; duṅhe—both of Them; se—that; jānila—could understand.
translation: When Caitanya Mahāprabhu heard this, His mind was satisfied. Only They could understand each other's minds.
